TEXT: A mind divided, but goals unchanged. NL Torment others, and enjoy it.
NL Tearing this thing apart will be so #r~fun.~

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some foul ritual. NL As you approach, they turn to you in unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, sickly looking hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~sister,~ ~and~ ~remember~ ~how~ ~it~ ~feels~ ~to~ ~be~ ~whole."~
